nws.name: Overnight
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers after 3am. Cloudy. Low around 48, with temperatures rising to around 51 overnight. South southwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday
nws.shortForecast: Chance Rain Showers then Partly Sunny
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers before noon. Partly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. West northwest wind around 5 mph. Chance of precipitation is 30%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

nws.name: Wednesday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy. Low around 40, with temperatures rising to around 42 overnight. North northeast wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Thursday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy. High near 61, with temperatures falling to around 59 in the afternoon. East wind around 5 mph.

nws.name: Thursday Night
nws.shortForecast: Mostly Cloudy then Chance Showers And Thunderstorms
nws.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between midnight and 3am, then a chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy. Low around 42, with temperatures rising to around 45 overnight. East wind 5 to 10 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%.

nws.name: Friday
nws.detailedForecast: Rain showers before 3pm, then rain showers and a slight chance of sleet. Cloudy. High near 45, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. Northeast wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 30 mph. Chance of precipitation is 80%.

nws.name: Friday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Sleet and rain showers before 9pm, then sleet and freezing rain and rain showers. Cloudy, with a low around 18. North northeast wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New snow accumulation of less than one inch possible. New ice accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nws.name: Saturday
nws.detailedForecast: Sleet and a slight chance of snow showers and a slight chance of freezing rain. Cloudy, with a high near 24. North wind around 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 100%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 3 inches possible. Little or no ice accumulation expected.

nws.name: Saturday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Snow showers likely and sleet likely. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 11. North wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph. Chance of precipitation is 60%. New snow accumulation of 1 to 2 inches possible.

nws.name: Sunday
nws.shortForecast: Slight Chance Snow Showers then Mostly Cloudy
nws.detailedForecast: A slight chance of snow showers before noon. Mostly cloudy, with a high near 23. Chance of precipitation is 20%.

nws.name: Sunday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 10.

nws.name: Monday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 33.

nws.name: Monday Night
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 12.

nws.name: Tuesday
nws.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny, with a high near 46.
